title: Men, Women, and Gods and Other Lectures
description: "...I have a right to offer my objections to the Bible from the standpoint of a woman.... That Book... degrades and belittles women,... The opposite opinion has been stated by hundreds of people, hundreds of times, for hundreds of years, ... it is only fair that I be allowed to bring in a minority report...." Helen H. Gardener
author: Helen H. Gardner
